events.message: I received the wrong product in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's message indicates they want to return an incorrect product and get their money back.
Assigning the case to the refunds department for further handling of the refund request.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us regarding your order issue. I'm here to help with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the product you received so we can process your refund?
Here is my order number 123456, and attached is a photo showing that I got the wrong item shipped to me.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate your refund immediately and send you a confirmation email once completed.
Thanks for the quick response and for starting my refund. I appreciate the good customer service.
Your refund has been processed and should appear back in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just following up to ensure you received your refund. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
As we have confirmed your refund, we will now close this case. Thank you for contacting support.
